metadata.title: CVE-2022-1048 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s sound subsystem inthe way a user triggers concurrent calls of PCM hw_params. The hw_freeioctls or similar race condition happens inside ALSA PCM for other ioctls.This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate theirprivileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-124-generic - 5.4.0-124.140
